meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive John Kyle Grady Shanna Lafferty Mike Nickel Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6718.

td.p: John Kyle Grady, a substitute teacher originally from Hyde Park, Massachusetts
Shanna Lafferty, a law student from Boyertown, Pennsylvania
Mike Nickel, a social worker from St. Louis, Missouri (whose 1-day cash winnings total $29,210)

tr.td: JOKERS ARE WILD
I'M HOLDING A PAIR
FULL HOUSE TAKES IT
FAR SOUTHERN NOVELS
PAPAL NAMES
ALSO A 2-LETTER POSTAL ABBREVIATION

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'This late funnyman, ever in search of respect: "I met the Surgeon General. He offered me a cigarette"')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: This late funnyman, ever in search of respect: "I met the Surgeon General. He offered me a cigarette"

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
